title: Apple and Chroma Partnering to Test Store-Within-a-Store Locations in India
text:
Apple and Chroma Partnering to Test Store-Within-a-Store Locations in India 
Published By: MacRumors.com - Today 
India-based consumer electronics chain Croma has announced a new partnership with Apple to introduce a few store-within-a-store locations in...
